content: toy duck ahoy duckie page 1 of 4 we recently went on a norwegian cruise ship apparently it is a thing to hide and find little ducks on the ship my 5 year old granddaughter was understandably excited about this i decided to knit some and ended up with about 20 to hide i couldn t find a pattern that had everything i liked so worked out my own here it is p s the adults on the ship seemed more excited about finding knitted ducks than the kids did this probably isn t a great beginner pattern as it has some techniques a beginner might not know - judy s magic cast on working in the round wrap and turns closing with kitchener and picking up stitches but it s a very quick little knit and i had fun making the little ducks toy duck ahoy duckie page 2 of 4 construction notes round 8 k1 m1 k8 m1 k1 k1 m1 k8 m1 k1 leaving a long tail for sewing the cardboard base in later the duck is started on the bottom using judy s magic the purl round following creates an edge for the bottom of cast on you could also use emily ocker s circular cast on your duckie to allow the duck to sit upright here s a link for that one round 9 purl 12 https //youtu be/mifq29dq6zu si=dfbr_v1o7ft7-wk3 purl 12 once the bottom is done you work a purl round to create an edge then you work up the duck adding a few wrap and body of duck turn rounds for shaping round 10 k12 k12 place scrap yarn for picking up the head stitches & knit a round cut the working yarn and hold it aside to use for kitchener round 11 k12 k12 cut the cardboard to an oval the size of your duck base and round 12 k2 m1 k2 x5 use your cast on tail to sew the cardboard into place k2 m1 k2 x5 close the body stuffing as you go with kitchener you ll end the kitchener at the head end of the duck round 13 k17 k17 pick up stitches for the head work the head stuff and close the next round has a wrap and turn to add some shape to make a beak sew it on make knots for eyes sew them on the duck s chest put a ribbon if you d like done round 14 k21 wt this is 4 past the round s mid point directions purl 8 wt this is 4 past the round s mid point base of duck k21 to end pick up wrapped stitch as you pass leaving a long tail approx 12 long and jmco cast on 5 round 15 k17 pick up the wrapped stitch as you pass it stitches bor is duck s tail k17 round 1 k5 round 16 k7 k2tog x3 k1 k2tog k1 round 2 * kfb * k1 k2tog k1
